means: 奥吉布瓦人(北美印第安人的一支)
奥吉布瓦语(属印第安人使用的阿尔冈昆语族)

PerfectNetExp.abs: oje 奥热, ojibwa 橘汁, ojell 奥耶尔

means.word_mean: 1. a member of an Algonquian people who lived west of Lake Superior
2. the Algonquian language spoken by the Ojibwa people

auth_sentence.content: Or Rene Caisse, whose Ojibwa formula healed thousands of cancer sufferers.
